title: SIONS QUOTES
body: hey guys matt here i just have a problem that im sure many players are having to its to do mainly with sions quotes and voice in game he will speak the quotes and sayings given to him as well as laugh but when gameplay starts and after a kill or anything really he wont say anything i hope riot can have a look into this asap as i love the new sions quotes thanks for listning and if anyone else has this problem feel free to comment :)

replies.body:
Oh that explains a lot. I thought they just didn't give him many quotes.

Also [here's the bug report board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
